briefTitle: Clinical Study to Test the Efficacy and Safety of ACYC to Treat Moderate to Severe Acne
officialTitle: A Phase 3, Multi-Center, Randomized, Double-Blind, Vehicle-Controlled, 2-Arm, Parallel Group Comparison Study Comparing the Efficacy and Safety of ACYC and ACYC Vehicle Gel in the Treatment of Acne Vulgaris
summary: The primary objective of this study is to compare the efficacy and safety and tolerability of ACYC Gel and vehicle in the treatment of subjects with Acne Vulgaris.

primaryOutcome.measure: Absolute Change in Inflammatory Lesion Count
